ReportDefinition.name: Definition
ReportDefinition.Sql: Select Applications.Name 'Applications', Applications.Version 'Versions', count(Computers.Name) 'Number', group_concat(Computers.Name, ', ') 'Computer Names' from Computers inner join Applications on Computers.ComputerID=Applications.ComputerID group by Applications.Name order by Applications.Name

Report.Description: Une liste de toutes les applications
Report.Name: Toutes les Applications
